Careers at Brunel

GlobalCareers

Development takes you further

Are you ready for the next step in your career? Join Brunel’s powerful global network, where passionate, results-driven specialists come together with industry-leading clients. By connecting specialists to pioneering projects, we drive change in many industries, enabling growth and delivering great outcomes. Brunel helps you reach your full potential and empowers you to make an impact within a purpose-driven global company.

 

Explore your career opportunities!

Connecting Specialists to Pioneering Projects

 

You decide your direction

As a specialist at Brunel, you get the opportunity to challenge yourself. What captures your attention? What skills do you want to improve? Do you want to be part of the energy transition or accelerate the digital transformation? You decide the direction of your career and we give you the tools to achieve your goals: education, training, personal coaching and inspiring knowledge sessions.

 

We have an extensive network of clients in multiple fields, so there will always be interesting opportunities that match your skills and ambitions. Together, we define the right project and the right company to enable you to take the next step in your career.

 

Combine maximum flexibility with the advantages of a permanent contract! 

Reasons to apply to Brunel

✓ Interesting and challenging projects at multiple companies

 

✓ Professional career development

 

✓ Global specialist communities to engage with and learn from

 

✓ Competitive salary

 

✓ Opportunity to drive change in various industries worldwide

 

✓ Being part of a purpose-driven organisation

We are one of the World's Best Companies 2024

We are proud that Brunel has been named one of the “World’s Best Companies 2024” by TIME magazine and Statista. This recognition, based on rigorous criteria including employee satisfaction, revenue growth, and ESG performance, highlights our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. It sets us apart in our industry, enhancing our reputation and fostering trust and loyalty among our clients and specialists.

Traineeships

Are you looking for a job that combines learning with working? Then the Brunel traineeship might be the right choice for you. It’s the ideal mix of working, learning and coaching. In one or two years, you will progress from starter status to being an experienced young professional – all with a fixed salary, training opportunities and the support of your colleagues.

Interested in an internal role?

Our values

Our values are at the center of everything we do for our clients, our colleagues and ourselves: Passion for people, Integrity, Results-driven and Entrepreneurship.

Read more

Environmental, Social and Governance

As a global company, we take our social responsibility very seriously. Our actions contribute to a healthier planet and a better future for generations to come.

Brunel Foundation

The Brunel Foundation aims to positively impact people and our planet by helping create a better future for professionals and a better planet for future professionals.
